initialMembersData.name: Nelson Wang
initialMembersData.title: Advisor
initialMembersData.description: Nelson is a senior majoring in Computer Science with a minor in Marketing and will be graduating in the Spring 2023 semester. He joined SLC during Fall 2021 to be more engaged with college activities and to enhance his programming skills. Upon his graduation, he plans to pursue a career as a software engineer. His dream is to develop and publish 100 apps before retiring.

initialMembersData.name: Esha Abbasi
initialMembersData.title: President
initialMembersData.description: Esha Abbasi is a senior pursuing a B.S. in Public Accounting and Business Management. She is an aspiring CPA and wants to further her career in that field. Esha is the President of the Koppelman Student Leadership Council however, she initially started as the Director of the Operations Department. She is passionate about giving back to the community with help of her leadership skills and her goal for SLC is to make it the most reputable council of Brooklyn College.

initialMembersData.name: Qasim Nadeem
initialMembersData.title: Co-President and Director of Operations
initialMembersData.description: Qasim is a senior pursuing a B.B.A in Finance and a B.S in Public Accounting and Business Management. After graduating, Qasim is looking forward to getting his licensure as a CPA and using the financial knowledge and skills to advance himself in his career. Prior experience studying financial markets with a team, over 3 years of customer service and having a leadership position here at the SLC has taught him how to work with a very diverse group of people and the patience needed for it.

initialMembersData.name: James Ma
initialMembersData.title: Director
initialMembersData.description: James is a super senior pursuing a B.S. in Public Accounting & Business Management. Upon graduation, James will be working full time at PwC in the State and Local Tax team. His experience includes a completion of 135+ hours of the Volunteer Income Tax Assistant program and internship from PwC where he further developed his business acumen and technological skills and received a return offer right after. He also had leadership positions roles from being the president of the Smooth Talkers club and as a Peer Mentor.

initialMembersData.name: Nagifa Tabassum
initialMembersData.title: Director of Club and Faculty
initialMembersData.description: Nagifa is a Sophomore majoring in Finance. She joined the Student Leadership Council (SLC) in her freshman year and currently holds the position of Director of Club and Faculty. She is passionate to build a strong community on campus with students beyond the Business school. SLC has helped her build leadership skills and in the future She aspires to start her career in coorporate banking.

initialMembersData.name: Tre Laforce
initialMembersData.description: Tre is currently pursuing a B.B.A in Finance, and minors in computer science. He loves reading topics on the economy, politics and finance, because being informed on aspects which may directly affect his life is important to him. He recently interned at Aon sitting in corporate strategy, and is now at a robotics startup executing business development. In the future he is planning on working in financial services, then hopes to transition into an advisory role. He is also an avid tennis player, having played #2 singles and #2 doubles for the Brooklyn College Menâ€™s tennis team.
